title: Nightmare Pickaxe
summaries: The Nightmare Pickaxe is a post-Eater of Worlds pickaxe. Its Crimson counterpart is the Deathbringer Pickaxe.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Nightmare Pickaxe can mine any <linked>blocks</linked> and ores weaker than <linked>Dungeon Bricks</linked> (which requires a pickaxe with at least 100% pickaxe power, e.g. a <linked>Molten Pickaxe</linked>). Most notably, it can mine <linked>Ebonstone</linked>, <linked>Crimstone</linked>, <linked>Hellstone</linked>, and <linked>Pearlstone</linked>.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the Nightmare Pickaxe can also mine <linked>Dungeon Bricks</linked>.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
